prompts: Create a blue and gray Pokemon that evolves into a powerful creature with spikes.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a rocky creature with a unique shape and a fierce look.
Design a middle-evolution Pokemon with sharp features and a cold demeanor; it should be blue.
Generate a Pokemon that has a sleek, spiky appearance and resides in mountainous regions.
Show me a rugged-looking Pokemon with a tough exterior and a mysterious personality.
Make a Pokemon that is primarily blue with gray accents and has a unique evolutionary path.
Give me a Pokemon that combines strength and resilience, featuring spikes and a tough body.
